channel.title: Comments on: Ideal Binary’s eBook Apps spreading like wildfire

item.title: By: Sean Burke
item.dc:creator: Sean Burke
item.description:
Directory of Android apps dedicated to Ireland. http://ireland.espalandroid.com/
As you already know Android is getting a close position to Apple and every day the Android Market receive new apps. This site will gather the best applications related with Ireland.
A selection of the best Irish apps for Android that bring you the services you need every day. Trains schedule and time tables, information about the city and several services to make your life easier.
Check out this site if you are in the Android mood...
Cheers Sean
item.content:encoded:
Directory of Android apps dedicated to Ireland.
http://ireland.espalandroid.com/

As you already know Android is getting a close position to Apple and every day the Android Market receive new apps. This site will gather the best applications related with Ireland.

A selection of the best Irish apps for Android that bring you the services you need every day. Trains schedule and time tables, information about the city and several services to make your life easier.

Check out this site if you are in the Android mood…

Cheers
Sean
